name: Ben Eine
description:
Ben Eine is one of the UK’s most prolific and original street artists specialising in grand, colourful lettering. Eine has now built an exceptional worldwide reputation and wanted a brand that positioned him as a credible contemporary artist.

My solution was to combine the black paint drips that Eine uses on the edges of his unique canvases with Eine’s signature Circus font. Applying the identity to a stationery range an outstanding result was achieved by mixing several processes; embossing, screen printing onto duplexed card and applying varnish to achieve a high gloss finish.

name: Sculptivate
description:
Event design & production company Sculptivate wanted a distinctive brand identity that imparted  the playful, vibrant and tactile nature of their work.

Using Play Doh, multicoloured pieces were pushed through a stencil which resulted in a simple, unique and colourful solution for the identity system.  Flecks of Play Doh were used on the stationery reverse to provide the burst of energy that encapsulated the brand. The final identity was  rolled out across stationery, website and apparel.

Sculptivate and their clients were extremely  pleased with the result. The identity was also featured in the Victionary book I Heart Avant Garde and the Rockport book 1000 Paper Graphics.

name: Invadercade
description:
We were asked by Taito (creators of classic arcade Space Invaders) to develop a promotional film for the launch of Invadercade - the worlds first iPad dock arcade machine. The film had to be interesting, informative, fun and memorable.

Instead of going down the route of an ‘infomercial’ I found inspiration in the 1970-80s, the period that Space Invaders originated in. After watching a few ‘vintage’ YouTube clips of Tomorrow’s World - the TV gadget show seemed the perfect fit for the level of product information we had to convey. I created a script and storyboard for ‘Tomorrow’s Way Today’  (or ‘TWT’), cast appropriate presenters, commissioned a suitably retro TV set build  and directed on the day.

View video

name: Final Fantasy XIV
description:
Final Fantasy XIV is the latest instalment of one of the world’s best know and  loved video games. This project ran for over two years with several concepts being created and produced.

FFXIV is a Massively Multiplayer Online Role Playing Game (or MMORPG for short), it is this multiplayer feature that makes it unique from previous instalments. It is also a ground-breaking game as it is a ‘cross-platform’ release playable online on PS3 and PC systems.

View video

name: Craig
description:
Craig Goldblatt is a motivational speaker with an a-typical approach to his field.  I wanted to develop an identity and online presence that set him well apart from his contemporaries.

The typical image of a motivation speaker is someone who is only interested in business and in making loads of money and this is not what Craig is about.

I wanted to make Craig Goldblatt seem more approachable whilst adding a sense of authority - this was achieved by simply re-branding him as Craig.

Craig’s approach is aimed at helping his audiences understand themselves and their environments first in order to help them be more successful people, I felt that it was important for the audience to  be able...
